target_include_directories(plugin_sa_lib PUBLIC
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/hooking
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/injector
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/plugin_sa
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/plugin_sa/game_sa
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/safetyhook
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/shared
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/shared/game
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/plugin-sdk/shared/extensions
        )

target_compile_definitions(plugin_sa_lib PUBLIC GTASA RW _HAS_CXX17)
